DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1 , single dose study 4 cohort ascend dos optional Japanese cohort design evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics MEDI5884 healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 , Single Dose Study Evaluate Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics MEDI5884
DOC.detailed_description: This first time human , phase 1 , randomize , blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single ascend subcutaneous dos MEDI5884 healthy volunteer ( age 18-55 ) . The study consist 4 cohort increase dos ( 8 subject ) optional Japanese American cohort ( 24 subject ) total 56 healthy subject . The decision whether dose escalate base upon data review Dose Escalation Committee . Subjects randomize 3:1 MEDI5884 placebo . Following screening , study consist 3 day inpatient stay follow visit . The number follow visit depend cohort assign .

Current smoker
